channel.title: Hacks on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in Hacks on David Collantes

item.title: Adrian Lamo Has Died
item.description: Adrian Lamo, mostly known as the hacker who broke into several major companies computer networks, and indirectly reported Chelsea Manning, has died — cause unknown thus far. The news was posted on Hacker News, of course, and I found one the comments — true or not — left there interesting. I had a car, while my friend did not, and Adrian had traveled via transit, so I spent the day with them hopping around town.
